item.description: Two models of generators can leak fuel from the carburetor. There are eight reports of the generators catching fire.

item.title: Atico International USA Recalls Halloween Mini Projection Lights Due to Burn Hazard; Sold Exclusively at Five Below
item.description: The mini projection lights can overheat and melt, posing a burn hazard to consumers.

item.title: Bose Recalls Dual-Voltage CineMate II Home Theater Speaker Systems Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The bass module can ignite when used in electrical outlets rated at 220 volts or higher, such as those found overseas.

item.title: Excel Industries Recalls Hustler and BigDog Lawn Mowers Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: Fuel can leak on riding or walk-behind lawn mowers with mowing decks ranging from 36 to 72 inches.

item.title: Imagine Nation Books Recalls Double Dazzler Light Show Toys Due to Burn Hazard
item.description: The silver plastic baton-like toys with spinning color wands have batteries that can overheat and burn.

item.title: FLO Cycling Recalls Rim Tape Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: The bicycle wheel rim tape can break under pressure. When this happens, the inner tube of the bike can puncture or burst.

item.title: Tricam Industries Recalls Easy Reach Step Stools Due to Fall Hazard; Sold exclusively at The Home Depot
item.description: The top step/standing platform can break. The step stools were sold from April 2012 through August 2012.

item.title: Rivers Edge Recalls Hunters Tree Stands due to Fall Hazard
item.description: The snap-hook assembly on Big Foot, Lite Foot and Baby Big Foot tree stands used for bow and rifle hunting can fail.

item.title: HatsanUSA Recalls Striker Air Rifles Due to Injury Hazard; Rifle Can Fire Unexpectedly
item.description: The air rifles shoot pellets and were available with black, camouflage and hardwood stocks.

item.title: ValcoBaby Booster Seats Recalled Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: The spring button mechanism that secures the toddler seat can disengage. The seat is designed to attach to Valco "Tri-Mode" and "Zee" strollers.

item.title: Dorel Juvenile Group Recalls Eddie Bauer Rocking Wood Bassinets Due to Infant Suffocation Hazard
item.description: The bottom locking mechanism can fail to lock, allowing infants to roll into the side of the bassinet. Two infants were reported to have breathing difficulties when this happened.

item.title: Summit Treestands Recalls Hunters' Tree Stands Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: The strap assembly on Crush series Perch, Stoop and Ledge Treestands can dislodge or fail and the climber can fall.

item.title: JELD-WEN Recalls to Repair Interior Bifold Doors Due to Impact Hazard
item.description: A pin in the doors can break, causing the door to disengage and fall.

item.title: Dream On Me Recalls Infant Swings Due to Strangulation Hazard
item.description: A child's body can pass through the opening on the Happy Swing II between the tray and seat or the grab bar and the seat and become trapped, if the child is not buckled in.

item.title: Dream On Me Recalls High Chairs Due to Strangulation Hazard
item.description: A child's body can become trapped at the neck between two different openings in the high chair if the child is not buckled in. Also, exposed springs can pinch a child.

item.title: Taphandles Recalls Ceramic Beer Tap Handles Due to Laceration Hazard
item.description: The custom-made beer tap handles can break during normal use.

item.title: Trend Lab Recalls Children's Upholstered Chairs Due to Laceration and Choking Hazards
item.description: Staples in the toddler chairs' rear bindings can loosen and can cut or be swallowed by young children.

item.title: Children's Apparel Network Recalls Fleece Hoodie and T-Shirt Sets Due to Violation of Lead Paint Standard; Sold Exclusively at Target
item.description: The toddler-sized children's clothing has Snow White, Mickey Mouse and Cars character designs.

item.title: ElliptiGO Recalls Elliptical Cycles Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: The drive arm on the ElliptiGO elliptical cycles can crack or break while the cycle is in use. This poses a fall hazard.

item.title: Sharper Image USB Wall Chargers Recalled by Atomi Due to Fire and Burn Hazards
item.description: The chargers can overheat and smoke.

item.title: Graco Recalls Classic Wood Highchairs Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: The high chair's seat can detach from the base. Graco has received reports of bumps, bruises, scratches and a concussion from falls.

item.title: Pink Angel Embroidered Girls' Denim Shorts Recalled by Buy Buy Baby Due to Choking Hazard
item.description: Decorative studs on the pockets can detach. The shorts were sold infant and toddler sizes 12M to 4T.

item.title: GE Recalls Front Load Washers Due to Injury Hazard
item.description: The GE Profile washing machine's basket can separate during use and break the washer’s top panel.

item.title: Haier America Recalls 42-inch LED-TVs Due to Risk of Injury
item.description: The support neck on the TV stand can break. If this happens the TV can fall. More than 180 cracks, breaks reported.

item.title: Kubota Recalls Off-Road Utility Vehicles Due to Carbon Monoxide Hazard
item.description: Carbon monoxide can accumulate in the 4x4 RTV500 utility vehicle's cab when the engine is idling and the vehicle is not moving.

item.title: Fitness Anywhere Recalls Early Model Suspension Trainer Devices Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: Fitness Anywhere has received 570 reports of the strap length adjustment buckles breaking with 13 reports of injuries. TRX suspension trainers sold from 2006 through 2009.
